readme:
This workflow automates outbound calls to qualified leads using [VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai) and Google Sheets. Here's how it works and how to set it up.

How It Works

Read Leads: The workflow starts by reading leads from a Google Sheet where the "AI call status" is marked as "NO"  
Batch Processing: Leads are processed one at a time (batch size = 1) to ensure proper sequencing  
Variable Setup: Extracts the phone number and row number from each lead record  
Trigger VAPI Call: Makes an API call to [VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai) to initiate an AI-powered outbound call  
Update Status: Marks the lead as "YES" in the Google Sheet after the call is triggered to prevent duplicate calls  
Detailed Setup Guide

Prerequisites

n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)  
Google Sheets account with OAuth2 credentials  
[VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai) account with API access  
Step 1: Google Sheets Setup

Create a Google Sheet with your leads data  
Ensure you have these columns (adjust if needed):  
Phone number (column E in the current setup)  
AI call status (column F in the current setup)  
Mark all leads you want to call with "NO" in the status column  
Step 2: Google Sheets Credentials

In n8n, go to Credentials > Add New  
Select "Google Sheets OAuth2 API"  
Follow the prompts to authenticate with your Google account  
Name it (e.g., "Google Sheets account 3" as in the example)  
Step 3: [VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai) Setup

Get your [VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai) API credentials  
In n8n, go to Credentials > Add New  
Select "HTTP Header Auth"  
Add your VAPI authorization header (typically "Bearer YOUR_API_KEY")  
Name it (e.g., "Header Auth account 4" as in the example)
readme_zh:
该工作流利用[VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai)和谷歌表格自动外呼合格销售线索，具体运作方式及设置步骤如下：

运作原理

1. 读取线索：工作流从谷歌表格中筛选"AI呼叫状态"标记为"NO"的销售线索  
2. 批量处理：每次仅处理一条线索（批量大小为1）以确保顺序执行  
3. 变量设置：从每条记录中提取电话号码和行号  
4. 触发VAPI呼叫：向[VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai)发起API调用启动AI外呼  
5. 更新状态：呼叫触发后将表格中对应线索状态更新为"YES"避免重复拨打  

详细配置指南

前置条件

- 可用的n8n实例（自托管或云端）  
- 具备OAuth2认证的谷歌账号  
- 拥有API访问权限的[VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai)账户  

步骤1：谷歌表格配置

1. 创建包含销售线索数据的表格  
2. 确保包含以下列（可根据需要调整）：  
   - 电话号码（当前设置为E列）  
   - AI呼叫状态（当前设置为F列）  
3. 在状态列中将待呼叫线索标记为"NO"  

步骤2：谷歌表格认证

1. 在n8n中进入"凭证管理">"新增"  
2. 选择"Google Sheets OAuth2 API"  
3. 按指引完成谷歌账号认证  
4. 命名凭证（如示例中的"Google Sheets account 3"）  

步骤3：[VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai)配置

1. 获取[VAPI.ai](http://VAPI.ai)的API凭证  
2. 在n8n中进入"凭证管理">"新增"  
3. 选择"HTTP Header Auth"认证方式  
4. 添加VAPI授权头（通常为"Bearer YOUR_API_KEY"）  
5. 命名凭证（如示例中的"Header Auth account 4"）
